Title: Relates to including defective air bags, anti-lock brakes, and license plates as grounds for failure of vehicle inspection
Summary: Relates to including defective air bags, anti-lock brakes, and license plates as grounds for failure of vehicle inspection.
LawCode: Amd ยง301, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the inspection of anti-lock brake system warning lights; tinted, shaded or obscured license plate covers; and supplemental restraint system air bags during the required periodic inspection of motor vehicles
